com.whirvis.jraknet

Class SplitPacketTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.SplitPacketTest

  • public final class SplitPacketTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test the split packet feature of the RakNetPeer through a stress test.

    This stress test sends the biggest packet possible over the RELIABLE_ORDERED reliability. The average packet size when performing this test is 146,000 bytes.

    Since:
    JRakNet v2.0.0
    Author:
    Trent Summerlin

                        java.lang.InterruptedException,

        The entry point for the test.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments. These values are ignored.
        Throws:
        RakNetException - if a RakNet error occurs.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread has interrupted the current thread. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the localhost address could not be found.

        Creates the client for the test.
        Returns:
        the client that will be sending the giant packet.
